data.name: 8bitsKarl/desc
data.value: «...а c 1 по 15 апреля 2014 года они вернули меня в далёкое детство, предложили управлять огромной серой мортирой «Karl»! И графика была восьмибитной! Восьмибитной, Карл!»

data.name: 8bitsKarl/title
data.value: Karl

data.name: DICEAwards2014/desc
data.value: February 7, 2014: World of Tanks wins the "Online Game of the Year" award at the D.I.C.E Awards 2014.

data.name: DICEAwards2014/title
data.value: D.I.C.E. Awards 2014

data.name: DogHouse/desc
data.value: Your canine chief of security temporarily lives here, guarding your vehicles. However, he also strongly advises that you take all the necessary precautions to keep your account secure.

data.name: DogHouse/title
data.value: Doghouse

data.name: DragonRidgeMap/desc
data.value: An oriental-themed map with a very complex terrain. We had to remove it in version 0.8.4 because the Dragon called and said he wanted his ridge back.

data.name: DragonRidgeMap/title
data.value: Dragon Ridge

data.name: E25/desc
data.value: Немецкая ПТ-САУ VII уровня. Выведена из продажи в обновлении 0.9.5, за что постоянно мстит в боях.

data.name: EGA2011/desc
data.value: August 15, 2011: World of Tanks receives the "Best European Online Game" award at European Games Award.

data.name: Fallout/desc
data.value: Возьмите этот превосходный флаг и доставьте его на свою превосходную базу, не забыв при этом превзойти команду противника. Доступно с выходом обновления 0.9.8.

data.name: Fallout/title
data.value: Domination

data.name: FirstApril2015/desc
data.value: И о погоде на 1 апреля 2015 года: переменная облачность, ветер умеренный, возможны кратковременные осадки из чемоданов.

data.name: FirstApril2015/title
data.value: Секретное оружие

data.name: Globe/desc
data.value: • 12 августа 2010 года состоялся официальный релиз игры на российском сервере. • 15 марта 2011 года состоялся релиз игры в Китае. • 12 апреля 2011 года состоялся официальный релиз игры World of Tanks на американском и европейском серверах. • 26 апреля 2012 года состоялся официальный запуск сингапурского сервера. • 27 апреля 2012 года состоялся официальный релиз игры во Вьетнаме. • 27 декабря 2012 года состоялся официальный релиз в Южной Корее. • 19 января 2014 года в танковых баталиях на серверах RU региона одновременно участвовало свыше 1 114 000 пользователей.

data.name: Globe/title
data.value: География Wargaming

data.name: GoldenJoystick2012/desc
data.value:
October 26, 2012: World of Tanks receives the "Best Online Game" award at the Golden Joystick Awards 2012.
By the way, the trophy looks awesome!

data.name: GoldenJoystick2013/desc
data.value:
October 25, 2013: World of Tanks receives the "Best Online Game" award at the Golden Joystick Awards 2013.
By the way, the trophy looks awesome!

data.name: GuinnessRecord/desc
data.value: January 23, 2011: World of Tanks sets the Guinness World Record for the number of concurrent players on one MMO game server, with a total of 91,311 players online at the same time.

data.name: GuinnessRecord/title
data.value: Guinness World Record

data.name: KRI2010/desc
data.value: May 16, 2010: World of Tanks receives the "Best Client-Based Online Game" award at the KRI-2010.

data.name: KRI2011/desc
data.value: May 14, 2011: World of Tanks receives the "Best Game" award at the KRI-2011.

data.name: KV/desc
data.value: Советский тяжёлый танк V уровня. В обновлении 0.7.3 был переплавлен в КВ-1 и КВ-2.

data.name: KV/title
data.value: KV

data.name: KV5/desc
data.value: Советский тяжёлый танк VIII уровня. В обновлении 0.7.5 превращён в музейный экспонат и выведен из продажи по многочисленным жалобам радистов.

data.name: KV5/title
data.value: KV-5

data.name: Napilnik/desc
data.value: A mythical and legendary artifact used by the Game Balance department to magically fine-tune every vehicle in the game.

data.name: Napilnik/title
data.value: Game Balance Apparatus

data.name: NationalLeader/desc
data.value: November 25, 2011: World of Tanks receives the "National Leader" award at the national voting stage of the Runet Prize 2011 ceremony.

data.name: NationalLeader/title
data.value: National Leader

data.name: PortMap/desc
data.value: The most lively map in the game. Removed in version 0.8.11 because sea merchants complained that constant tank battles disrupted their trade routes and scared their customers.

data.name: PortMap/title
data.value: Port

data.name: PzKpfw38H735/desc
data.value: Трофейный французский лёгкий танк с длинным названием и тяжёлой судьбой на службе Германии. Выведен из продажи в обновлении 0.7.1.

data.name: PzKpfw38H735/title
data.value: Pz.Kpfw. 38H 735 (f)

data.name: PzKptwB2740/desc
data.value: Трофейный французский тяжёлый танк на службе Германии. Демилитаризирован и изъят из продажи в обновлении 0.7.1. Был лучшим танком для обучения радистов.

data.name: PzKptwB2740/title
data.value: Pz.Kpfw. B2 740 (f)

data.name: RuinbergInFireMap/desc
data.value: The dark and dreary version of the Ruinberg. Removed from the game in version 0.9.5 due to its excessive amount of gloom per square meter.

data.name: RuinbergInFireMap/title
data.value: Ruinberg on Fire

data.name: SeverogorskMap/desc
data.value: The coldest map in the game. Removed in version 0.9.5 because the severe elements made the fuel in players' vehicles freeze, forcing them to stay at the base for the whole battle.

data.name: SeverogorskMap/title
data.value: Severogorsk

data.name: Sturmtiger/desc
data.value: Будет введён в игру в ближайшем обновлении. Или не в ближайшем. Или не будет.

data.name: Sturmtiger/title
data.value: Sturmtiger

data.name: T23/desc
data.value: Американский средний танк VIII уровня. В обновлении 0.6.5 ушёл поработать над собой. Помолодел на уровень и вернулся в игру под именем T23E3 в виде награды за успехи на Глобальной карте.

data.name: T502/desc
data.value: Советский лёгкий резвый танк V уровня. Уволился в запас в обновлении 0.8.7, приведя на своё место преемника: флегматичного МТ-25.

data.name: TankFootball/desc
data.value: «...и вот, мяч у Т-62А, он ловко проходит в среднюю зону, обходит одного защитника, второго, пробирается в штрафную площадь, УДАР! И!.. Гусеница сбита, движение невозможно...» — такие матчи были частым событием в игре с 12 июня по 13 июля 2014 года.

data.name: TankFootball/title
data.value: Танковый футбол

data.name: TankRace/desc
data.value: Эрон-дон-дон, леди и джентльмены. Давите на газ и летите вперёд за кубком Чемпиона танковых гонок! С 29 сентября по 13 октября 2014 года занимайте свои места на трибунах и наслаждайтесь непередаваемой атмосферой гоночного чемпионата.

data.name: TankRace/title
data.value: Танковые гонки

data.name: Type59/desc
data.value: Китайский средний танк VIII уровня. В обновлении 0.7.1. стал мечтой тех, кто не успел.

data.name: Type59/title
data.value: Type 59

data.name: WGFaces/desc
data.value: Делаем игру лучше вместе с вами и для вас!

data.name: WGFaces/title
data.value: Доска почёта

data.name: WhiteTiger/desc
data.value: From May 3 through May 31, 2012, there was a legend of the ghost of a vehicle appearing on the battlefield, and only those whose spirit was strong, could banish that vile spirit from our world (of tanks).

data.name: WhiteTiger/title
data.value: White Tiger

data.name: WinterBattle/desc
data.value: С 5 по 15 января 2015 года в World of Tanks наблюдалась повышенная активность Рейдеров, Берсерков и Мамонтов, сошедшихся в жаркой и динамичной «Зимней битве».

data.name: WinterBattle/title
data.value: Зимняя битва

data.name: burda/desc
data.value: Guards Colonel Alexander Burda was a Soviet tank ace and a Hero of the Soviet Union. On October 4th, 1941, Burda organized an ambush that destroyed an enemy armored column, including ten medium and light tanks, two trucks with antitank guns, and five infantry vehicles. He died in battle on January 25, 1944. His actions hindered the advance of 12 enemy vehicles and helped the brigade headquarters successfully evacuate.

data.name: burda/title
data.value: Alexander Burda

data.name: fadin/desc
data.value: A Hero of the Soviet Union, Alexander Fadin was a T-34 commander. Supported by one infantry platoon, Fadin managed to capture the village of Dashukovka (Ukraine) and hold it for five hours with one tank. He destroyed one tank, one SPG, eighteen machinegun nests, and neutralized up to 50 enemy soldiers and officers. His crew also shot down an enemy plane. Fadin ended the war in the Far East, where he participated in destroying the Kwantung Army as a commander of a tank company.

data.name: fadin/title
data.value: Alexander Fadin

data.name: kolobanov/desc
data.value: Colonel Zinoviy Kolobanov was a Soviet tank ace who destroyed 22 German tanks, two guns, and two armored vehicles with his KV-1 in the battle on August 19, 1941. The tanker fired 98 AP shells from his concealed tank, which received more than 100 hits. On September 15, 1941, Kolobanov was heavily wounded and stayed under treatment until the end of the war.

data.name: kolobanov/title
data.value: Zinoviy Kolobanov

data.name: lavrinenko/desc
data.value: Dmitry Lavrinenko, a Hero of the Soviet Union, Guards Lieutenant, tank ace, and a commander of the T-34 was recognized as a top Soviet tanker, who destroyed 52 tanks in 28 battles over the course of two and a half months. He died during a mortar attack on the Goryuny village, Volokolamsk Region, on December 18, 1941.

data.name: lavrinenko/title
data.value: Dmitry Lavrinenko

data.name: naydeen/desc
data.value: Sergeant Grigoriy Naydin was a BT-7 commander. On June 25th, 1941, near the Lithuanian town of Rudishkyay, he destroyed a Wehrmacht armored column that included 15 vehicles and 10 guns of the 19th Mechanized Corps. Naydin managed to hold off the German advance for two days, making it possible to organize the defenses around Vilnius. For this action, Naydin was made a Hero of the Soviet Union. He was wounded twice and continued to serve in the Armed Forces of the USSR after the war.

data.name: naydeen/title
data.value: Grigoriy Naydin

data.name: oskin/desc
data.value: Alexander Oskin, a Hero of the Soviet Union, was a tank commander who destroyed three King Tigers with his T-34 during a reconnaissance operation near Oglenduv on August 11, 1944. The following day, his tank was one of the first to rush into the Oglenduv village, which resulted in the capture of another three working King Tigers. One of the captured tanks with hull number 502 is currently exhibited in the Kubinka Tank Museum.

data.name: oskin/title
data.value: Alexander Oskin

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutMap_01/desc
data.value: The first representative of Swedish vehicles in game. The "Strv" abbreviation means Stridsvagn, which is translated as a "tank". In the early 1950s, the Swedish army was confronted with a question of modernizing the armored forces. Along with medium vehicles (among which the U.K. Centurion tank was selected), the army needed a mobile and light vehicle. One AMX-13 with a 75-mm gun was purchased in France for trials. The trials were successful, but the vehicle was deemed too expensive. However, engineers came up with an idea to mount its turret on the chassis of the Strv m/42 medium tank, but the project remained only in blueprints, and the army opted for the Strv 74, which met their requirements and was cheaper in terms of manufacturing.

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutMap_01/title
data.value: Strv m/42-57 Alt A.2

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutMap_02/desc
data.value: Aux armes! In this version, the "Paris" map became available for Random Battles. The new battlefield features tight winding streets that provide great cover for allied heavy vehicles. The central square is dangerous because shots can come from all directions, while the embankment of the Seine with an unfinished fountain is an ideal area for approaches in fast, maneuverable vehicles.

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutMap_02/title
data.value: Paris

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutMap_03/desc
data.value: You are harmlessly surfing through the game content and accidentally sell your favorite Premium vehicle or dismiss a skilled crew member. Are you tired of this happening? Well, suffer no more! We designed a new feature that will improve your quality of life significantly! Now you will be able to recover the sold vehicle or dismissed crew member. The conditions are as follows: • Premium vehicles can be recovered using credits within 3 days after the sale. • Each special and event vehicle can be recovered using credits once every 3 days. • A crew member can be recovered for free within two days after the dismissal and using credits within 30 days.

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutMap_03/title
data.value: Vehicle and Crew Recovery

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutMap_04/desc
data.value: Dear players! We are happy to announce that the current spotting system was significantly improved. We increased the speed of client and server calculations, which will allow you to spot your enemies instantly. Therefore, enemy vehicles will not be able to slip past the open space between two objects without being spotted (if these vehicles are in your view range). In addition, lag and freezes related to the moment of spotting will disappear. We are planning to constantly improve the spotting system to ensure comfortable gaming.

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutMap_04/title
data.value: Updated Spotting System

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutPromo_01/desc
data.value:
In this version, the physical model for vehicle movement underwent significant changes. The vehicles’ behavior became more realistic; additional features of the improved model allow you to perform brand new maneuvers, including a J-turn and drifting. In addition, your vehicle can reach new heights (in every sense of the word) and take unexpected firing positions, which promotes diverse gameplay on most maps.
Be as attentive as possible when moving across rugged terrain and driving down steep slopes, as a maneuvering mistake may cause your vehicle to overturn onto its sides or roof. If your vehicle is lying on its roof, a 30-second timer will appear (similar to the drowning timer), and you won’t be able to fire. Hope your allies can help, or your vehicle will be destroyed. Don’t forget that your vehicle can also be overturned by ramming.

data.name: envIN_007_FalloutPromo_01/title
data.value: Improved Vehicle Movement Physics

data.name: flag/desc
data.value:
For the first time, the Wargaming.net League Grand Finals will be held in Moscow. This tournament is a major competitive event in World of Tanks. All professional tankers aspire to participate in it.
Prepare for a clash between the world's best teams and lots of spectacular battles! All tankers are constantly sharpening their combat skills, and this year they will definitely raise the bar.

data.name: flag/title
data.value: Grand Finals 2017

data.name: hellraisers/desc
data.value:
HellRaisers traveled a long journey to clenching the World of Tanks Champions title. Back in 2015, they were deemed the main competitors of Natus Vincere in the RU region and had a reputation of reckless and skilled players.
In the semifinal, the encounter between the two ended with a dramatic victory for HellRaisers by a score of 5:2; in the final match, they smashed their rivals from China and won the championship.
In 2016, then known as TORNADO ENERGY, they beat Na`Vi in the final match of the Champions Rumble and won a pass to the 2017 Grand Finals.

data.name: hellraisers/title
data.value: HellRaisers

data.name: navi/desc
data.value:
In 2014, Natus Vincere proved their absolute dominance by winning the first Grand Finals of the Wargaming.net League in Warsaw.
In 2016, they once again confirmed their superiority by claiming victory over their main competitor, HellRaisers, who were the reigning champions at that time.

data.name: navi/title
data.value: Natus Vincere
